name: Protect Your Home
description:
This is a city called Phyllis, everything is floating in the clouds. One day people are told that the city is short of energy and is about to be in darkness, seriously at risk of disappearing. In response to the emergency, a group of young people was drawn from among the citizens. You are chosen as the guardian to keep the city running by collecting moons and extracting energy. Can you protect your home？

Controls

Move: W, A, S, D

Jump: Spacebar

ESC: Pause the game

Info

DATT3300

Name: Xiaoyao Ren

LAB 02
